tool.name: Annotate VCF file with RS IDs

param.name: input1
param.label: VCF file
param.help: Can only upload a VCF that contains one chromosone.

param.name: display_region
param.label: Extract records from this region
param.help: If you do not select this it will find the chromosome and region from your input file automatically

param.name: region
param.label: Type in region - Only if the box above is ticked
param.help: The format of the region is chr:start..end, where the and end coordinates are 1-based

tool.help:
This tool annotates a VCF with file with the RSIDs from the installed version of the DBSNP file that is required for this tool to work.
The tool then extracts the specified region from the VCF file.
Credits
The tool uses Samtools Tabix ( tab-delimeted indexer ). http://samtools.sourceforge.net/
The tool uses SnpSift to annotate from dbSNP. SnpSift is writted by Cingolani, P. "snpEff: Variant effect prediction", http://snpeff.sourceforge.net, 2012.
